Articles.Content:
> 
> I smash a Star Destroyer into your hill. My hill and Star Destroyer.

I reject your hill and substitute it with my own.

My hill.

I push you of the hill/debris pile and plant my flag.

My hill!

I reject your reality and subsitute my own. In which the hill is mine.

My hill.

The last person who tried to get rid of me with Zombies forgot this:

> 
> I emerge from the ground as a zombie and I build a new hill with a laboratory doing who knows what.

I emerge from the ground, still undead, and I take over the hill.

A bolt of blinding white brilliance strikes you dead, divine justice having been served. 

By order of the powers that be, this hill is now Odin's.
I dig Odin's hill and make one with the dirt. My hill.

I land a spaceship from who knows where on the mountain and I detonate a foul stink bomb to get everyone off so I can claim the hill for myself.

My stinky hill

I use Kerbin's largest fan to blow the stink cloud away, as you were in the stink cloud, you are blown away with it I then use Fe-breeze to freshen the hill up.

My Fresh-smelling Hill.

> 
> The last person who tried to get rid of me with Zombies forgot this:
> I emerge from the ground, still undead, and I take over the hill.

You are hypnotized, so I'm taking you as a human.

> 
> I use Kerbin's largest fan to blow the stink cloud away, as you were in the stink cloud, you are blown away with it I then use Fe-breeze to freshen the hill up.
> My Fresh-smelling Hill.

Gargantuars incoming!

![078.PNG](http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140104234429/plantsvszombies/images/3/36/078.PNG)

My hill.

(Also, I can't be defeated by brute force alone. You'll have to use your *Plants vs. Zombies 2: It's About Time!* logic to defeat me. I'm on a Zombot War Wagon.)

I crush your ipod........

MY hill with Designer sobbing in a corner ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I take your hill, and push it somewhere else! Then I build mine where yours used to be. Your hill, my location!

> 
> I crush your ipod........
> MY hill with Designer sobbing in a corner ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I don't have an iPod, so you crushed nothing. And don't expect me to cry. Besides... There are NO Zombies that can be "planted" in PvZ2! I'm just thinking it would be great to include some of PvZ1 and PvZ2 elements (You can guess what PvZ stands for.).

Anyway...

> 
> I take your hill, and push it somewhere else! Then I build mine where yours used to be. Your hill, my location!

![Zombot_Sphinx-inator2.png](http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140206015917/plantsvszombies/images/a/a3/Zombot_Sphinx-inator2.png)

Ready... Set... Plant!

ok you want to play like that!!!

I take the hill and plant

 ![Hard.png](http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130914101933/plantsvszombies/images/d/d5/Hard.png)

All around IT

come at me bro

MY HILL WITH MID-EVIL walnut wall!

![Nut_cracker.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/9a/Nut_cracker.jpg)

I come at you with my mid-evil wall-nut wall crackers and I take over the hill.

My hill.

![I,_Zomboss.PNG](http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110424234444/plantsvszombies/images/4/48/I,_Zomboss.PNG)

No one's hill (The former owner escaped, and I have no intention of occupying the hill.).

I come an occupy the UN-occupied hill.

My hill.

You must have an imitater (or rather, imitator).

![Imi-Almanac.png](http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120807115604/plantsvszombies/images/f/f5/Imi-Almanac.png)

(Ah yes, I can remember the old days...)

I dropped the book off as a present. Mikeman's almanac - with a secret, cute (but dangerous) weapon.

I run for the hills.

Your silly single hill is insignificant.

My hills.

> 
> I run for the hills.
> Your silly single hill is insignificant.
> 
> My hills.

I take the hill, after all you are now playing 'for the hills' and thats a game you are playing on your own

> 
> I take the hill, after all you are now playing 'for the hills' and thats a game you are playing on your own

I sniped you. No one's hill.

I claim the hill and make a R&D lab, where I begin researching wormholes. I then slip on some spilt juice and fall into it.

Still, no one's hill

I revive and make a virtual hill comprised of Mainsails on my KSP save.

My Mainsail hill.

I turn on infinite fuel, making the mainsails all turn on, crash everywhere, and desolate the landscape. I then re-build the hill where it once was.

My hill

You looked at the operational end of The Device.

My hill.

You ATE the operational end of the device (I may or may not have had something to do with that) and I take over the hill.

My hill.
